Mr Andy Coulson quit as the paper's editor in 2007 saying he took ultimate responsibility for the scandal, but denied knowing about the phone hacking. In a statement, he said it had been a privilege and an honour to work for David Cameron for three-and-a-half years and he was proud of the work he had done.
